text: Ronald Patrick was an English professional footballer who played as an outside right. ==Career== Pashley began his career with Salts, before joining Bradford City in 1938.Frost, p. 403 He made 1 league appearance for the club,Frost, p. 387 before being released in 1939. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Association football outside forwards Category:Salts F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ronald Patrick (footballer)
